subject.version_a: {{firstName}}, how can I improve your USMCA workflow experience?

emails.preheader: Help us serve you better + exclusive feedback reward

content.plainText:
{{firstName}},

I noticed {{companyName}} completed our USMCA workflow trial but didn't move forward with a subscription.

As Customer Success Manager, I'm committed to understanding why.

ðŸ“‹ QUICK 2-MINUTE FEEDBACK?

Sarah Chen

subject.version_b: Preserving your trial results + future opportunities

emails.preheader: Moving to quarterly updates - keeping your options open

content.plainText:
{{firstName}},

It's been 3 weeks since {{companyName}} completed the USMCA workflow trial.

I respect that implementation timing varies for every company.

HERE'S WHERE WE STAND:

ðŸ“ PRESERVING YOUR TRIAL WORK:
â€¢ Complete workflow analysis (${{trialSavings}} savings identified)
â€¢ HS code classifications and USMCA qualifications
â€¢ Mexico partner recommendations and contact details
â€¢ Certificate of Origin templates (CBP-approved)
â€¢ Implementation roadmap (ready for activation)

â­ï¸ TRANSITIONING YOU TO:
â€¢ Quarterly Mexico market updates
â€¢ New supplier partnership announcements
â€¢ Regulatory changes affecting {{industry}}
â€¢ Success stories from similar companies
â€¢ Early access to new platform features

âŒ WHAT I'M NOT DOING:
â€¢ Aggressive sales follow-up sequences
â€¢ Sharing your data with competitors
â€¢ Pressure tactics or artificial urgency
â€¢ Removing your trial access (remains active)

ðŸ”® FUTURE OPPORTUNITIES:

Next quarter, we expect:
â€¢ 15+ new Mexico partners joining network
â€¢ Enhanced AI classification features
â€¢ Expanded USMCA compliance automation
â€¢ New industry-specific workflow templates

ðŸ“§ CHOOSE YOUR PREFERENCE:

Reply with your choice:
â€¢ "QUARTERLY UPDATES" - Stay informed, zero pressure
â€¢ "REMOVE COMPLETELY" - Full removal from all communications  
â€¢ "TIMING CHANGED" - Ready to revisit implementation
â€¢ "CUSTOM SCHEDULE" - Specific follow-up timeline

Whatever you choose, I appreciate the opportunity to demonstrate Triangle Intelligence value.

Your trial showed {{companyName}} has excellent Mexico opportunities.

Those opportunities aren't disappearing - they're actually growing stronger.

Sarah Chen
Customer Success Manager
Triangle Intelligence

P.S. - 43% of companies who choose "quarterly updates" implement within 6 months when their timing improves. The market education keeps you prepared.

highEngagement.action: Immediate sales director escalation + phone call

partialWorkflow.definition: Started but didn't complete full trial workflow

highSavings.allEmails: Enterprise plan focus, ROI emphasis, executive positioning

exitConditions: User subscribes to any paid plan

personalizedContent.automotive: Focus on TechFlow case study, supply chain resilience
personalizedContent.textiles: Highlight sustainable suppliers, fast fashion capabilities
personalizedContent.manufacturing: Focus on precision partners, quality certifications
